plot: As a way to make peace between two feuding Scottish clans, one invites the other over for supper, but things don't turn out quite as expected.
title: Short Kilts
plot_es: As a way to make peace between two feuding Scottish clans, one invites the other over for supper, but things don't turn out quite as expected.
plot_en: As a way to make peace between two feuding Scottish clans, one invites the other over for supper, but things don't turn out quite as expected.
